onset.Description: Onset (in seconds) of each trial_type event

duration.Description: Duration of the event (measured from onset) in seconds

trial_type.119: Resting w/ eyes opened run begins
trial_type.120: Resting w/ eyes opened run ends
trial_type.121: Resting w/ eyes closed run begins
trial_type.122: Resting w/ eyes closed run ends

eye_onset.Description: Timestamp in eyetracking data that matches each trial_type event in EEG data (arbitrary units output by the eye tracker in milliseconds).
